member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Auth.DenyAnonymousMiddleware
member.summary: This middleware can be placed at the end of a chain of pass-through auth schemes if at least one type of auth is required.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Auth.DenyAnonymousMiddleware.Invoke(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.param: OWIN environment dictionary which stores state information about the request, response and relevant server state.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Auth.ImpersonationMiddleware
member.summary: Impersonates the authenticated user if any.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Auth.ImpersonationMiddleware.Invoke(System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.param: OWIN environment dictionary which stores state information about the request, response and relevant server state.

member.name: T:Owin.DenyAnonymousExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods for the DenyAnonymous middleware.

member.name: M:Owin.DenyAnonymousExtensions.UseDenyAnonymous(Owin.IAppBuilder)
member.summary: Permit only authenticated requests beyond this point in the pipeline.

member.name: M:Owin.ImpersonationExtensions.UseImpersonation(Owin.IAppBuilder)
member.summary: Impersonate the authenticated user if present.
